vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀλεκτορ-οφωνία, ἡ,
cock-crow, i.e. third watch of night, [NT+1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: crowing of a rooster; the third Roman watch of the night (about midnight 3.00 a.m.)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: the cock-crowing, the third watch of the night, intermediate to mid-night and daybreak, and termed cock-crow, Mk. 13:35*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: antes del amanecer (lit. canto del gallo, la guardia de la medianoche hasta las 3:00 a.m.)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 雞鳴
1a) 用以指夜間的第三更時段(可 13:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 鸡鸣
1a) 用以指夜间的第三更时段(可 13:35)
